com.netflix.imflibrary.writerTools

Class RegXMLLibHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.imflibrary.writerTools.RegXMLLibHelper

  • public final class RegXMLLibHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class that provides the methods to obtain a RegXML representation of a MXF metadata set

    • Method Detail

      • getDocumentFragment

        public org.w3c.dom.DocumentFragment getDocumentFragment(com.sandflow.smpte.klv.Triplet triplet,
                                                        org.w3c.dom.Document document)
                                                 throws MXFException
        A utility method that provides an XML Document fragment representing an MXF KLV triplet
        Parameters:
        triplet - the KLV triplet that needs to be serialized to an XML document fragment
        document - the XML document that the document fragment is associated with
        Returns:
        An XML DOM DocumentFragment
        Throws:
        MXFException - if any error occurs while trying to create the document fragment

      • getEssenceDescriptorDocumentFragment

        public org.w3c.dom.DocumentFragment getEssenceDescriptorDocumentFragment(com.sandflow.smpte.klv.Triplet essenceDescriptorTriplet,
                                                                         java.util.List<com.sandflow.smpte.klv.Triplet> subDescriptorTriplets,
                                                                         org.w3c.dom.Document document)
                                                                  throws MXFException
        A utility method that provides an XML Document fragment representing an Essence Descriptor in the MXF file
        Parameters:
        essenceDescriptorTriplet - - a KLV triplet corresponding to an Essence Descriptor
        document - an XML document
        subDescriptorTriplets - list of triplets corresponding to the subdescriptors referred by the essenceDescriptor
        Returns:
        An XML DOM DocumentFragment
        Throws:
        MXFException - if any error occurs while trying to create the document fragment

      • getTripletFromKLVHeader

        public com.sandflow.smpte.klv.MemoryTriplet getTripletFromKLVHeader(MXFKLVPacket.Header header,
                                                                    ByteProvider byteProvider)
                                                             throws java.io.IOException
        A utility method that provides an in-memory triplet representing an MXF KLV packet
        Parameters:
        header - - the MXF KLV header corresponding to an MXF KLV packet
        byteProvider - - data provider for the MXF KLV packet
        Returns:
        A memory triplet representing the MXF KLV packet
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - any I/O related error will be exposed through an IOException
